command.name: fix
command.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code

disambiguation.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code
examples: There is a problem in this code. Rewrite the code to show it with the bug fixed.

parts.text:
Type '{ name: string; }' is not assignable to type 'Exact<(Without<CategoryCreateInput, CategoryUncheckedCreateInput> & CategoryUncheckedCreateInput) | (Without<...> & CategoryCreateInput), (Without<...> & CategoryUncheckedCreateInput) | (Without<...> & CategoryCreateInput)>'.
  Property 'slug' is missing in type '{ name: string; }' but required in type '{ parentId?: undefined; id?: Exact<string | undefined, string | undefined>; slug: string; name: string; description?: Exact<string | null | undefined, string | null | undefined>; ... 4 more ...; products?: Exact<...>; }'.

response.value: property is required when creating a category, so you need to add it to the data object.

examples: Add a function that returns the sum of two numbers

examples: Change this method to use async/await

slashCommands.name: explain
slashCommands.description: Explain how the code in your active editor works

examples: Write an explanation for the code above as paragraphs of text.

slashCommands.name: tests
slashCommands.description: Generate unit tests for the selected code

disambiguation.description: Generate unit tests for the selected code. The user does not want to fix their existing tests.
examples: Write a set of detailed unit test functions for the code above.
